extendedInfo.description: Ad free!  Many more features!Big Brother 15 is here! Yes, there are spoilers. Use Pocket Big Brother to keep up with the latest updates. Updates are provided by Survivor Sucks and JokersUpdates. Also, get the latest tweets from the current HOH, as they send their thoughts to twitter.Features Include-2 separate updates feeds (jokersupdates,survivor sucks), with possibly more to be added. -Drill down the view the original post on the web. -Twitter support, media, and former house guests.-Podcasts-News-Blogs

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Wish it could hold a longer list of updates, sometimes I miss stuff if too much happens before I check
reviews.author: mike lu

reviews.comment: Loved the free app. Had to upgrade. More \"stuff\" now. Thanks.
reviews.author: Mary Romesburg
